pkgmetadata.longdescription: Addons for the 'mclust' Package // Extend the functionality of the 'mclust' package for Gaussian finite mixture modeling by including: density estimation for data with bounded support (Scrucca, 2019 doi:10.1002/bimj.201800174); modal clustering using MEM (Modal EM) algorithm for Gaussian mixtures (Scrucca, 2021 doi:10.1002/sam.11527); entropy estimation via Gaussian mixture modeling (Robin Scrucca, 2023 doi:10.1016/j.csda.2022.107582).
